}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *http://pci-ids.ucw.cz/read/PC/14e4/4331 :SS: 106b:00d6, 106b:00f5 :[[Broadcom]] BCM94331PCIEBT4 (AX/CAX) 3x3:3 MIMO (assumed) + BCM2070 on-board for bluetooth
Per a C2PC made 01/17/2013, this device is used :(or will be) in the ''[[Apple]]'' A1278, A1286, and A1297.
*[[Apple MacBook Pro 13" (Late 2011)]] :(MC700LL/A, MC724LL/A, MD313LL/A, MD314LL/A) *[[Apple MacBook Pro 13" (Mid 2012, A1278)]] (MD101, MD102) :(MD313LL/A, MC024LL/A, MC371LL/A, MC372LL/A, MC373LL/A)
===Compatible Model=== Macbook Pro Unibody A1278, A1286, A1297: *MacBook Pro 13" (Early 2011, Late 2011) *MacBook Pro 15" (Early 2011, Late 2011) *MacBook Pro 17" (Early 2011, Late 2011) MacBook Pro 9,2" (Mid 2012) (MD101LL/A, MD102LL/A)
